hadiths.text: Narrated Bilal: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said to Bilal: Do not call adhan until the dawn appears clearly to you in this way, stretching his hand in latitude. Abu Dawud said: Shaddad did not see Bilal

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الأَذَانِ قَبْلَ دُخُولِ الْوَقْتِ
chapter.eng-name: Calling The Adhan Before Its Time
